title: Pixel 3XL won't turn on or charge
content:
My phone will not turn on. When I charge it a gray battery icon shows up on the screen for a couple seconds. I thought this meant my phone was dead, but even after charging for 2 hours it will still not turn on.

A couple days before my phone shut off completely it was already having difficulty charging. I tried three different chargers and none of them would charge my phone properly. However, when using these chargers on other devices they worked fine.

I have done all the suggested steps for when your phone won't turn on or charge but none of them are working. Any help would be appreciated.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
